alert.note: Alert for Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 11:43PM MST until December 07 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Areas of Blowing and drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow will reduce visibility to under 2 miles at times. Drifting snow will make travel on rural roads difficult. Strong crosswinds will make travel for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution. Check road conditions before travel. Call 511 for road reports. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency
